Based on the preferences you mentioned, I would recommend "Ariel" from 1965.
The movie is about a Finnish man who goes to the city to find a job after his mine where he worked is closed and his father commits suicide.
In the city, he meets a girl named Ariel. She is a mermaid who lives in an underwater kingdom calledAtlantis.
Ariel agrees to help the Finnish man find a job in the city. In return, the Finnish man promises to help Ariel escape from her underwater kingdom of Atlantis.
The movie has a beautiful soundtrack and amazing visual effects that bring the underwater kingdom of Atlantis to life on screen.
Overall, "Ariel" is a classic Disney animated film that has stood the test of time and continues to be beloved by fans of all ages around the world.
